dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: ... I don't understand.
Stored in this armory are the very same gear my team and I have been using until just a few days ago.
I remember receiving a report that there were Abnormalities and Distortions that we were to exercise martial force to suppress.
Upon hearing that, I came in here and packed a few ammo cans full of anti-Abnormality special rounds for the mission. I remember it as clearly as if it happened yesterday.
So how come they are all so... faulty now?

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Sonar Interference Module... It's got a snapped actuator cable. Impact-distributive Attenuation Unit... It's not even here.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Default Cognition Filter settings are all jacked up, too...
These were all functions that, while never used that frequently, were consequential enough that I was pushed to use them all at least once while on an operation.
Something about this smelled funny; it was too precise and intentional to be disregarded as a mere coincidence.
Almost as if... someone who possesses a comprehensive technical and tactical knowledge of each gear sabotaged them.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: What the hell is this?

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Ma'am?

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Couldn't you have kno— Hm. I don't suppose there was any reason for you to knock.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: No, Ma'am. I did not knock, on account of this being an armory.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: ... So, what is your business?

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: A document for you, Ma'am.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: It is a business letter... Latest-release Dimensional Container Issuance Logistics Notice, Ma'am.
Latest-release Dimensional Container...? Must be referring to the wallet model I saw in the pamphlets some time ago.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: I do wonder if it really is necessary to replace that gear again, especially when the last renewal was but a month ago... But why not, I suppose.
This company... is disgustingly rich.

I have no idea how they do it, but they keep picking up these partnerships with corporations and Workshops, even snagging the rights to internally distribute their yet-to-be-announced products as a test run...
When I see them eagerly issuing us gears loaded with Singularity tech, which must've cost them a fortune in patent fees, it almost makes me wonder if they never even consider the idea of budgeting.
Even the gears in this armory are all high-quality—no, they're not just high-quality, they're extravagantly top-notch.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Very well. Leave it on my desk, and...

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: ... Hold on. Do you know who was responsible for running the last gear inspection?

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Of this armory? Technicians sent directly by the higher-ups in the LCA, Ma'am. They came in a few days ago to test their functionalities.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: From the HQ?

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Yes, Ma'am. Ah, by any chance, would you like us to run an inspection of our own—

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: ... No, don't worry about it. They already ran an inspection just a few days ago anyway; no need to concern yourselves with doing it again.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Anyway... How's the situation down at the research facility?

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: According to the transmission from the Before Team, it seems to me they're having a hard time getting a clear picture of what's happening within the facility.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Regardless, the word is that the Recon team of the special operations unit might be getting deployed soon.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: The special operations unit? Are the portals working again?

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: No, Ma'am.
Strange. The HQ's response is too tepid, considering it's the Research Facility of the LCE under attack.

Even stranger still, Wayfarer Corp., responsible for the development and service of the Backdoor Portal stabilization technology for the HQ, hasn't reacted in any meaningful way to this rather serious breach of security.
Perhaps they've already talked this out with the higher-ups, but...
... Either way, this isn't something a mere Team Leader like myself should rack her head over.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Would you like us to go on standby for deployment, just in case?

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Ha. Say it like you mean it next time.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Just take it easy for now.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Yes, Ma'am.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: ... I should inspect the rest of the gear in here.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Hmm...

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: ... And that's everything.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: So, the HQ employees left these gears in such states of disrepair, huh...

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: But they've left these too neatly organized afterward to chalk it up to mere negligence.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: What could this shady company possibly be planning now...?
After the Smoke War came to a close...
... I wandered for a while, unable to find a place to settle. Until, one day...
... I was scouted by a rather peculiar Grade-1 Fixer Office, which has mysteriously maintained its grade despite its rather middling fame and performance, via a mutual acquaintance connection.
The terms of the contract, which were delivered to me with a heads-up that we would later be a part of a corporation called "Limbus Company," were almost unbelievably lucrative.
Although the role I was to take was that of a simple team leader at a company I had only just heard of, I was offered with an eye-watering salary...
... and those assigned under my command were nothing less than what one would call "elite" operatives.
Despite those incredible perks, there were moments when I could not help but feel a sudden chill running down my spine as I carried out the missions sent to us from the higher-ups.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Our next mission... Seems to me we'll be sent to obliterate a Finger subsidiary known as "The House of Spiders."
Yes, now is one such moment.
There's this sudden chill again, that I might be getting swept up in a current much greater than myself.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: In the zone we're handling... ah. Looks like we'll be responsible for dealing with a... Proxy of the Index, who was once a Star of the City all on his own.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: ... We're going to need a new strategy.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Udjat Talata, cover the gap on our left.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: I'll take the right.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Tsk. We lost the target.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Ma'am, how do you think the Proselytes found out about this place?

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Through the Prescripts. What else could it possibly be?
Among the Index members who crashed the fight, the ones wearing long capes went after the so-called "Index Nursefather" without engaging us.
That Nursefather had a rather nasty, almost fatal wound...
... but assuming that the Index members who went after the Nursefather would provide appropriate medical assistance, survival was still a possibility.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: We suffered some heavy losses, but... this is a rather acceptable outcome.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Numerous rarely-used functions and additional Workshop gear you brought to the mission really came in through the clutch in this operation, Ma'am.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: ... I thought preparing as wide a range of options as possible seemed to be the most apt countermeasure against an enemy that is difficult to predict, that is all.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: As for our deceased, collect their gear...

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: ... and either incinerate or crush their faces.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Well, then... time for the report.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Come in. This is LCA Vanguard Team, Udjat.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Position secured, over.
I sense it all in that slight exhale coming through the radio.
The surprise, followed by marvel. And through it all... an undercurrent of annoyance.
The listener is impressed by the unexpected success...
... but annoyed by the fact that the said success undermined the real intent behind the mission.

dataList.title: LCA
dataList.content: Is that so?
... That might as well have been a confirmation of my suspicions.
Now, I know who sabotaged our gears in the armory.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: Any internal documents and bodies found on-site will be collected by the After Team.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: As for the handover of Relics to the LCA R&D team—

dataList.title: LCA
dataList.content: We will be giving the Relic-handling task to a different party.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: ... Understood.

dataList.title: LCA
dataList.content: Do you have any further questions?

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: ... Negative.

dataList.title: LCA
dataList.content: Listen, Team Leader.

dataList.title: LCA
dataList.content: Please keep up the good work. Exactly as you are doing now.
There were many questions to be explored upon my return, but...
... at this moment, I had only one answer to mutter back into the radio.

dataList.title: LCA Vanguard Team 3
dataList.content: ... Understood.
